item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Codebuff (YC F24) – CLI tool that writes code for you (142 points | 106 comments)
2. Bird Flu Infections Undetected (18 points | 14 comments)
3. Using Ghidra and Python to reverse engineer Ecco the Dolphin (275 points | 63 comments)
4. AI for real-time fusion plasma behavior prediction and manipulation (180 points | 93 comments)
5. Sustainable Web Interest Group Is Formed (52 points | 18 comments)
6. QNX is now free for anything non-commercial, plus there's an RPi image (319 points | 125 comments)
7. Functional ultrasound through the skull (45 points | 11 comments)
8. Mushroom Color Atlas (119 points | 15 comments)
9. Show HN: BemiDB – Postgres read replica optimized for analytics (109 points | 52 comments)
10. Edge Scripting: Build and run applications at the edge (50 points | 24 comments)
11. Imaging shapes of atomic nuclei in high-energy nuclear collisions (24 points | 2 comments)
12. The Brothers Grimm: A Biography (29 points | 3 comments)
13. I'm not mutable, I'm partially instantiated (142 points | 51 comments)
14. Hyperlight: Virtual machine-based security for functions at scale (37 points | 7 comments)
15. Excerpts from a conversation about personal information management (128 points | 59 comments)
16. Ultraprecise method of aligning 3D semiconductor chips invented (110 points | 10 comments)
17. Sega is delisting 60 classic games from Steam, so now's the time to grab them (12 points | 5 comments)
18. Five minutes of exercise a day could lower blood pressure (17 points | 2 comments)
19. Toronto crypto company CEO kidnapped, held for $1M ransom before being released (22 points | 3 comments)
20. Kagi Translate (155 points | 62 comments)
21. Linux Syscall Support (135 points | 83 comments)
22. A counter-intuitive guide to better leadership (79 points | 24 comments)
23. Bluesky's at Protocol: Pros and Cons for Developers (40 points | 9 comments)
24. Physics-informed Shadowgraph Network: End-to-end Density Field Reconstruction (12 points | 1 comment)
25. Optery (YC W22) Is Hiring Product Managers and Full Stack Developer (Node.js) ( | hide)
26. Richard A. Cash, who saved millions from dehydration, has died (144 points | 39 comments)
27. DNA from Pompeii Victims Reveals Surprising Relationships Amidst the Chaos (29 points | 1 comment)
28. Automat (200 points | 72 comments)
29. URAvatar: Universal Relightable Gaussian Codec Avatars (94 points | 12 comments)
